body.contents: In an act recurrence without a base case, I decided to include the very website you are currently viewing my resume on as a piece of my resume.

Before starting this, I had never really put together a complete frontend of a website, other than for a few classes. However, at that time I knew far less about the ecosystem that exists in the web development communityâ€¦ seriously, there is something like 3 package managers I need to use on a regular basis...

So, what technologies did I teach myself during the making of this website? Angular, TypeScript, Foundation, SCSS, Grunt, and NPM & Bower. That is almost as much as when I taught myself Emacs, Make, and C all at the same time...
